task.title: Adding contacts
task.shortdesc: A contact is someone you added to one or more of your groups.

context.p: After you add a contact, you can start a chat with the contact or display information about the contact without searching through the directory.

step.cmd: From the contact list, tap the menu icon and select Add Contact.
step.info: If the group to add is in your list, tap it and select Add Contact. This action is not allowed within a public group.

step.cmd: Enter some of the contact information in the search bar. Enter the name of the contact, given name first. You can also enter the first few letters of the given name.
Highlight the name of the person to add.
Select the group to add the contact.
